It's all about making a fresh breakfast sandwich you can grab and go. Just choose your bread and layer on the fixings: egg, cheese, precooked meat, or the ingredients of your choice. products.longDescription: The Lasko Elegance & Performance Large Room Pedestal Fan will help you and your whole family stay comfortable in warm weather. Lightweight and easily portable so you can move the fan from bedroom, to living room, to kitchen to efficiently circulate air. This sleekly designed pedestal fan has an 18-inch blade and features 3 speeds, widespread oscillation, adjustable height, and tilt fan head for customized airflow. It offers a quiet operation with energy-efficient, superior performance. It is easy to assemble and requires no tools. To ensure utmost safety, this adjustable fan is E.T.L-listed and includes a fused safety plug.
products.name: Lasko - 18 in. Oscillating 3-Speed Adjustable Large Room Pedestal Fan - Black

products.longDescription: Cut beef, pork, poultry and vegetables to the precise thickness you need with this 9-inch Weston meat slicer. The adjustable control lets you change the thickness in seconds, and the removable stainless steel blade and tilt-out food tray make cleanup convenient. This quiet-operating Weston meat slicer has suction cup feet for stability during use.
products.name: Weston - 9" Electric Food Slicer - Stainless Steel

products.longDescription: Heat a large dish or plenty of food items in this 1.2 cu. ft. Sharp Microwave Drawer oven. Its design offers multiple installation options in your custom-designed kitchen, and the large capacity holds a 4-quart casserole dish. Open and close this 24-inch Sharp Microwave Drawer oven via its manual handle or the auto touch control panel.
products.name: Sharp - 24" 1.2 Cu. Ft. Built-in Microwave Drawer - Stainless Steel

products.longDescription: Save time and money with a dual tap water cooler from Avanti. The perfect water cooler for the office, kitchen, worksite, warehouse, gym, or anywhere you want to add a hydration station. Enjoy instant access to a refreshing glass of cold or room temperature drinking water from the dual faucet dispenser. This top-loading water dispenser accommodates 3 or 5-gallon water bottles, helping reduce waste from single-serve bottles.
products.name: Avanti Water Dispenser, Cold and Room Temperature, in White

products.longDescription: Ventilate your kitchen effectively with this Whirlpool in-line blower. The three-speed fan vents 1200 cfm of air to the exterior of your property and operates quietly without disturbing other activities. This Whirlpool in-line blower has a 10-inch round duct to clear your kitchen of odors quickly, and it operates with commercial range hoods.
products.name: Whirlpool - Hood Inline Motor - Stainless Steel

products.longDescription: Whether you need 8 dozen* of your signature chocolate chip cookies or shredded chicken for Taco Tuesday with friends and family, the KitchenAid Classic Series 4.5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer has the capacity for every occasion. This durable tilt-head stand mixer was built to last, and features 10 speeds to gently knead, thoroughly mix and whip ingredients for a wide variety of recipes and comes in a variety of colors to perfectly match your kitchen design or personality. Get creative and make more with your mixer with over 10 optional hub-powered attachments*, from food grinders to pasta makers and more. *Using the flat beater; 28g dough each **sold separately.
products.name: KitchenAid - Classic Series 4.5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer - K45SSWH - White

products.longDescription: Enhance your cooking area with this 30-inch Frigidaire glass canopy wall-mount hood. Three-speed dual centrifugal fans provide up to 400 cfm of quiet ventilation, and the halogen lighting illuminates your work area and adds to the kitchen ambience. Operate this Frigidaire glass canopy wall-mount hood easily with its five mechanical control buttons.
products.name: Frigidaire - 30 inches - Externally Vented & Recirculating - Wall Range Hood - Stainless Steel/Glass

products.longDescription: Convert your Bosch range hood to a recirculating design with this Bosch HCREC5UC recirculation kit, which features a carbon filter for efficient odor elimination. For use with select wall-mounting and island range hoods.
products.name: Recirculation Kit for Select Bosch Range Hoods - Silver

products.longDescription: Extend your Bosch range hood duct with this Bosch HCBEXT5UC extension kit, which features a 39.63" - 72.44" extension for use in kitchens with 9' - 12' ceilings. The durable stainless-steel design complements your range hood for a seamless look.
products.name: Box Canopy Chimney Hood Extension Kit for Select Bosch Range Hoods - Stainless Steel

products.longDescription: Neutralize odors in your kitchen with this Bosch HCIFILTUC charcoal filter, which can replace metal filters in select recirculating range hoods. The carbon design efficiently eliminates smoke and odors for a kitchen that smells fresh.
products.name: Charcoal Filter for Select Bosch Recirculating Range Hoods - Silver

products.longDescription: Keep your kitchen free of smoke and odors with this Bosch 500 Series HCB50651UC range hood, which features a powerful 4-speed fan and washable stainless-steel filters for easy cleanup. An optional kit (not included) converts the hood to recirculation.
products.name: Bosch 500 Series - 30 inches - Externally Vented & Recirculating - Wall Range Hood - Stainless steel

products.longDescription: Design your kitchen with greater freedom with this Bosch 500 Series HCB56651UC range hood, which features a 4-speed fan and dishwasher-safe filters to keep your kitchen smelling fresh. An optional kit (not included) converts the hood to recirculation.
products.name: Bosch 500 Series - 36 inches - Externally Vented & Recirculating - Wall Range Hood - Stainless steel

products.longDescription: Customize your range hood to reach 9' - 12' ceilings with this Bosch HCPEXT5UC range hood extension kit. The stainless-steel material complements your range hood and ensures long-lasting use.
products.name: Pyramid Canopy Chimney Hood Extension Kit for Select Bosch Range Hoods - Stainless Steel

products.longDescription: Prepare meals, reheat food and more with this GE JK3800SHSS electric wall oven and microwave combination, which features glass touch controls for simple operation and spacious compartments for your dishes. The 16" turntable rotates for even cooking.
products.name: GE - 27" Single Electric Wall Oven with Built-In Microwave - Stainless steel

products.longDescription: This GE JT3800SHSS electric wall oven and microwave combo features glass touch controls for effortless meal preparation. The 5.0 cu. ft. lower oven and 1.7 cu. ft. upper oven capacities accommodate cookware of various sizes.
products.name: GE - 30" Single Electric Wall Oven with Built-In Microwave - Stainless steel

products.longDescription: Get a modern look and quiet, effective ventilation for all of your cooking with this 3-speed, 400 CFM motor class glass island kitchen hood. Noise reduction technology provides sound insulation and a special chimney design to deliver sound levels as low as 49 dBA at low speed. Perimetric Venting technology helps remove smoke and odors by concentrating hood suction to targeted zones on your cooktop. You'll be able to easily see what you're cooking with efficient LED task lighting, and the range hood's glass edge LED lighting senses when your kitchen lights dim and automatically turns on to act as a night-light.
products.name: Whirlpool - 36 inches - Convertible - Island Range Hood - Stainless steel
